title: Log In Error (NA)
body:
While logging in today for the first time im receiving an error saying my account has been changed to a different region and cannot login. 
Wondering if anyone knows what this is caused by or how to fix this.

No i did not change it myself.
I was playing last night and bought the new Harrow skins and then today i was met with this error.

Looking for any help at all cause im not to sure what to do, Support has been contacted already but no response yet.

replies.body: It looks like a specialist is already assisting with this!  Continue corresponding with them, and they'll be able to help out.  Good luck!

They have t gotten back to me, some french guy made a ticket also saying he lost access to MY email and how he could change it my account is in euw now and i cant even change the password from the recovery page. This isnt being taken care of at all right now. I woke up to a bunch of emails trying to get confirmation from someone but i never requested it. I need help other wise im gonna lose my account

Thanks for the update.  I've included this information for some more context, so your specialist will be wary of what's going on here.  We'll reach out to you as soon as possible and help restore access.  The account was also security locked by us to prevent any damage to the account, until we can get it back to the rightful owner.  Hang tight!
